metadata.title: CVE-2023-29932 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
llvm-project commit fdbc55a5 was discovered to contain a segmentation faultvia the component mlir::IROperand<mlir::OpOperand.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-29932` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

clang-13 - 1:13.0.1-2ubuntu2.2
clang-13-examples - 1:13.0.1-2ubuntu2.2
clang-format-13 - 1:13.0.1-2ubuntu2.2
clang-tidy-13 - 1:13.0.1-2ubuntu2.2

criterions.comment: llvm-toolchain-13 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:13.0.1-2ubuntu2.2').
llvm-toolchain-14 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:14.0.0-1ubuntu1.1').
llvm-toolchain-15 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:15.0.7-0ubuntu0.22.04.3').
